mapper.select: select v.vctn_num, v.emp_num, e.emp_name, to_char(v.vctn_start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as startdate, to_char(v.vctn_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as enddate, v.vctn_type_num, vt.vctn_name, vt.vctn_time, vt.deduction_day, v.vctn_reason, floor(trunc(v.vctn_end_date,'MI')-trunc(v.vctn_start_date,'MI')) as countday from vacation v inner join emp e on v.emp_num = e.emp_num inner join vacation_type vt on v.vctn_type_num = vt.vctn_type_num order by v.vctn_num
mapper.insert: insert into vacation(vctn_num, emp_num, vctn_type_num, vctn_start_date, vctn_end_date, vctn_application_date, vctn_reason, vctn_approval) values (vctn_num_seq.nextval,#{emp_num}, #{vctn_type_num}, #{vctn_start_date}, #{vctn_end_date}, to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') , #{vctn_reason}, #{vctn_approval})
mapper.update: update vacation set vctn_type_num= #{vctn_type_num}, vctn_start_date= #{vctn_start_date},vctn_end_date=#{vctn_end_date}, vctn_reason=#{vctn_reason} where vctn_num = #{vctn_num}
mapper.select: SELECT v.vctn_start_date, v.vctn_end_date, vt.vctn_name FROM vacation v INNER JOIN emp e ON v.emp_num = e.emp_num INNER JOIN vacation_type vt ON v.vctn_type_num = vt.vctn_type_num WHERE e.emp_num = #{EMPNUM}
